content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
source.name: CNN

author: Barbara Starr, CNN Pentagon Correspondent
title: US chief of naval operations to self-quarantine
description: The chief of naval operations will self-quarantine after he came in contact with a family member who has tested positive for the coronavirus, according to a US official.
source.name: CNN

author: Jeremy Diamond, CNN
title: Pence will not self-quarantine and plans to be at the White House Monday
description: Vice President Mike Pence is not planning to enter self-quarantine after his press secretary tested positive for coronavirus on Friday and plans to be at the White House on Monday, a Pence spokesperson said on Sunday.
content:

author: Taylor Barnes and Theresa Waldrop, CNN
title: Remains of 25 people found in mass grave in Mexico's Jalisco state
description: Law enforcement in Mexico's Jalisco state discovered a mass grave with the bodies of at least 25 unidentified people, the prosecutor's office in that state said.
source.name: CNN

author: Michelle Krupa, CNN
title: Start your Monday smart: Graduations, Congress, reopen, police, Disney, baseball, UFC
description: Graduations go online. Congress heads back to the Hill. More states reopen. Slain officers are honored. Disney sings. (Korean) baseball and UFC begin play. Here's what the next six days will bring.
content:
(CNN)Even as experts advise we stay 6 feet apart, 1,000 people from 18 countries found a way to safely join forces to create this lovely rendition of a Burt Bacharach classic.

author: Opinion by Dean Obeidallah
title: Trump's jaw-dropping attack on California's voting plan
description: Dean Obeidallah writes that President Donald Trump's attacks on both mail-in and in-person voting arrangements for California's May 12 congressional election -- especially his suggestion that some ballots shouldn't be counted -- are a threat to US democracy
source.name: CNN
